00034 double DmetCopyNumberData::getN_0(string region){
00035   map<string, double>::iterator iter=m_N_0.find(region);
00036   if( iter != m_N_0.end()){
00037     return iter->second;
00038   }
00039   Err::errAbort("Unable to get region info");
00040   return 0.0;
00041 }

00194 // Probeset specific set and get functions.
00195 void DmetCopyNumberData::addPredictionProbeSet(string region, string probeSet){
00196   set<string> newSetOfProbes;
00197   map<string, set<string> >::iterator iter=m_PredictionProbeSetMap.find(region);
00198   if(iter!=m_PredictionProbeSetMap.end()){
00199     (iter->second).insert(probeSet);
00200   } else {
00201     // We have a new region
00202     newSetOfProbes.insert(probeSet);
00203     m_PredictionProbeSetMap.insert(     map<string, set<string> >::
00204                                 value_type(region, newSetOfProbes ) );
00205   } 
00206 }

00208 void DmetCopyNumberData::addGenotypeProbeSet(string region, string probeset){
00209   //  cout<< "set:" + region + '\n';
00210   m_GenotypeProbeSetMap[region].push_back(probeset);
00211 }

00268 set<string> DmetCopyNumberData::getPredictionProbeSetNamesForRegion(string regionName){
00269     map<string, set<string> >::iterator iter=m_PredictionProbeSetMap.find(regionName);
00270     if( iter != m_PredictionProbeSetMap.end()){
00271         return iter->second;
00272     } 
00273     Err::errAbort("Unable to find probeset list for region " + regionName);
00274     set<string> nullSet;
00275     return nullSet;
00276 }

00292 
00293 double DmetCopyNumberData::getSampleProbeSetIntensity(string sampleName, string probeSetName) const {
00294   map<string, map<string, double> >::const_iterator iter1=m_IntensityData.find(sampleName);
00295   if(iter1!=m_IntensityData.end()){
00296     map<string,double>::const_iterator iter2=(iter1->second).find(probeSetName);
00297     if( iter2!=(iter1->second).end() ){
00298       return iter2->second;
00299     } else {
00300       throw "Unable to find summary value for probeset " + probeSetName;
00301     }
00302   } else {
00303     throw "Unable to find summary data for sample " + sampleName;
00304   }
00305 
00306   throw ("Reached unexpected part of code.");
00307   return 0.0;
00308 }
00309 
00310 
00311 void DmetCopyNumberData::setSampleProbeSetIntensity(string sampleName, 
00312                                                 string probeSetName, 
00313                                                 double intensity){
00314 
00315   //Verbose::out(1,"Setting data: " + sampleName + ", " + probeSetName + ", " + ToStr(intensity));
00316 
00317   typedef map<string,double>::value_type mapValueType;
00318   typedef map<string, map<string,double> >::value_type mapOfMapValueType;
00319 
00320   string markerName = probeSetName.substr(0,probeSetName.rfind("-"));
00321   string alleleName = probeSetName.substr(probeSetName.rfind("-"));
00322 
00323   map<string,double> intensitiesForANewSample; 
00324   map<string, map<string,double> >::iterator iter=m_IntensityData.find(sampleName);
00325   if(iter!=m_IntensityData.end()){
00326     if((iter->second).find(markerName) != (iter->second).end()){
00327         // we already have data for one or more alleles
00328         m_IntensityData[sampleName][markerName] += intensity;
00329     } else {
00330       // We have a new probeset for a known region.
00331       (iter->second).insert( mapValueType(mapValueType(markerName, intensity))); 
00332     }
00333   } else { 
00334     // We have a new region 
00335     intensitiesForANewSample.insert(mapValueType(markerName,intensity)); 
00336     m_IntensityData.insert(mapOfMapValueType(sampleName, intensitiesForANewSample));
00337     intensitiesForANewSample.erase(     intensitiesForANewSample.begin(),
00338                                         intensitiesForANewSample.end()); 
00339   }
00340 }
